comments.body: From the [`setup.py`](https://github.com/MolSSI/QCFractal/blob/master/setup.py) there should be [`entry_points`](https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/source/resources/define-metadata.html?highlight=selectors#python-entry-points) specified here.
Good catch on the entry points. I missed those!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"
  entry_points:
    - qcfractal-server = qcfractal.cli.qcfractal_server:main
